name: Multiverse Rumble 3
description:
Multiverse Rumble 3 is the prequel to the well-beloved Multiverse Rumble series of games. This game focusses on darker tones, but the characters are well and alive.

  • Plenty of characters and stages to rumble on
  • New Mode: Zombie Survival: Your character of choice is trapped inside an abandoned building, filled to the brim with Zombies. It's their task to escape this building (chosen at random). You can fend off the zombies by either attacking them or building barriers on the doors. (This mode can be found by going into the missions tab, then selecting Bonus)
